subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brian Gregory, who led Dayton to its first N.C.A.A. tournament victory in 19 years on Friday, is a longtime friend, former employee and ex-roommate of Michigan State Coach Tom Izzo.
snippet: Brian Gregory, who led Dayton to its first N.C.A.A. tournament victory in 19 years on Friday, is a longtime friend, former employee and ex-roommate of Michigan State Coach Tom Izzo.
